A note of interest: we were told point blank by the awful man behind the bar that he would not serve someone who spoke English.  This is Catalonia, I am Catalan, etc. Mind you, we did not speak English to him, just to each other.  The locals nearby were stunned at his attitude.  I politely attempted to order from him in Spanish, his mind was made up.  Unless you can pull off passing as a local, I highly suggest that you dine elsewhere.  There is no signage on the establishment, just the street number.  Perhaps this helps with the locals only policy.  The food looked good.
